title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and embed via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, pull, and manage models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated list of community-contributed Modelfiles for Ollama (CodeLlama, SQLCoder, etc.).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model, supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLMs into channels via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a service inside CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with documents.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of Ollama for drop-in replacement.
